about_the_game:
GN Wagon Pack

The Great Northern Railway operated between Washington and Minnesota, running along part of the old Transcontinental route. In 1970, the GN name disappeared from the rails as it was folded into the merger which formed Burlington Northern, itself now part of the BNSF Railroad.
The GN Wagon Pack includes the following rail vehicles in GN livery:
GN Boxcar 40-foot
GN Caboose
GN Gondola
GN Hopper 55-ton
GN Hopper 70-ton
GN Ore Hopper
detailed_description:
GN Wagon Pack

The Great Northern Railway operated between Washington and Minnesota, running along part of the old Transcontinental route. In 1970, the GN name disappeared from the rails as it was folded into the merger which formed Burlington Northern, itself now part of the BNSF Railroad.
The GN Wagon Pack includes the following rail vehicles in GN livery:

GN Caboose
GN Gondola
GN Hopper 55-ton
GN Hopper 70-ton
GN Ore Hopper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
